instructions.title: How to use the app?
instructions.intro: Placing your order is easy. Follow these simple steps:
instructions.step1Body: Browse categories and find your favorite dishes.
instructions.step2Body: Use the + and - buttons to choose how many you want.
instructions.step3Body: Press the cart button to see all selected products.
instructions.step4Body: When you're ready, press "Go to pay" to finish your order.
instructions.helpBody: If you have any questions or issues, press the "Waiter" button and a team member will come to your table.
